Description: Failed to take effective measures, such as the provision  of fixed, enclosing guards, or where this is not practicable, other guards or protection devices such as a movable guard fitted with an interlocking device, to prevent access to the rotating rollers of the mobile mixing machine, whereby employee came in contact with the said rollers whilst attempting to remove a foreign object, resulting in serious injury to his right hand, including degloving and severing of the middle finger.
